co.cask.cdap.etl.api

Interface TransformContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LookupProvider, PluginContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatchContext, BatchRuntimeContext, BatchSinkContext, BatchSourceContext, RealtimeContext

    @Beta
public interface TransformContext
extends PluginContext, LookupProvider
    Context passed to ETL stages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StageMetrics getMetrics()
      Get an instance of Metrics, used to collect metrics.
      PluginProperties getPluginProperties()
      Gets the PluginProperties associated with the stage.
      String getStageName()
      Gets the unique stage name of the transform, useful for setting the context of logging in transforms.

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.plugin.PluginContext

        getPluginProperties, loadPluginClass, newPluginInstance

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.etl.api.LookupProvider

        provide

    • Method Detail

      • getPluginProperties

        PluginProperties getPluginProperties()
        Gets the PluginProperties associated with the stage.
        Returns:
        the PluginProperties.

      • getMetrics

        StageMetrics getMetrics()
        Get an instance of Metrics, used to collect metrics. Note that metric names are not scoped by the stage they are emitted from. A metric called 'reads' emitted in one stage will be aggregated with those emitted in another stage.
        Returns:
        Metrics for collecting metrics

      • getStageName

        String getStageName()
        Gets the unique stage name of the transform, useful for setting the context of logging in transforms.
        Returns:
        stage name
